java.lang.classfile.attribute.LocalVariableTableAttribute

Packages that use LocalVariableTableAttribute
Package
Description
java.lang.classfile
Provides classfile parsing, generation, and transformation library.
java.lang.classfile.attribute
Provides interfaces describing class file attributes for the java.lang.classfile library.

    Subinterfaces with type arguments of type LocalVariableTableAttribute in java.lang.classfile.attribute
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    LocalVariableTableAttribute
    Models the LocalVariableTable attribute (JVMS 4.7.13), which records debug information about local variables.
